description.p: computes the n-grams of annotations in and creates an annotation for each n-gram. If is set, then no n-gram will cross boundaries of annotations in this layer. If is set, then will search for annotations with n-gram boundaries in these layers, if one annotation is found then it is recycled instead of creating a new annotation.

param-doc.name: maxNGramSize
param-doc.p: Maximum number of tokens in n-grams.

param-doc.name: keepAnnotations
param-doc.p: Name of layers where to search for recycled annotations.

param-doc.name: targetLayerName
param-doc.p: Name of the layer where to add n-gram annotations, recycled annotations will also be added in this layer.
